研究揭示了空气污染对衰老社会的健康和经济影响空气污染是全球越来越多的健康问题，在日本等衰老社会中，其影响通常被低估了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-reveals-health-and-enhealth-and-ecomonic-ecomonic-ecomonic-impact-er-air-pollution-ingage-societies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-reveals-health-and-enhealth-and-ecomonic-ecomonic-ecomonic-impact-oar-impact-er-air-pollution-inging-societies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc3ca2c0-241-41-4dce-8690-A6527ECF9F5F Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:23:00 -0500 Study reveals health and economic impact of air pollution in aging societies
修改生物材料可能会导致更有效的癌症疗法VTC的弗拉林技术研究人员说，修改微观生物材料的物理特征与人体组织无缝相互作用可以解锁更安全，更有效的癌症治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/modifying-biomaterials-may-lead-to-more-effective-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/modifying-biomaterials-may-lead-lead-to-more-effective-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=799444464-998B-4DA5-A7A3-F7AC84CC07A7 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:19:28 -0500 Modifying biomaterials may lead to more effective cancer therapies
研究表明，医院如何安全地减少不必要的术前测试对于许多患者而言，准备进行手术意味着在手术前的几周内进行血液，检查心脏节奏或进行其他测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/Study-shows-how-hospitals-can-safely-reduce-unnecessary-preoperative-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-shows-how-how-how-hostals-can-safely-reduce-reduce------------------safely-reduce-------------safely-reduce-notectss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A4076365-1C7D-4C09-8588-2D5ED864F775 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:15:16 -0500 Study shows how hospitals can safely reduce unnecessary preoperative tests
使用流行GLP-1药物的患者的视力损失风险引起了人们的关注服用非常流行的GLP-1药物的一小部分患者遇到了视力问题，但是尚未建立与药物的直接因果关系。这是1月30日在线发表的JAMA Ophthalmology在线发表的一项回顾性研究的结论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/vision-loss-risks-in-patients-using-popular-glp-1-medications-raise-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/vision-loss-risks-in-patients-using-popular-glp-1-medications-raise-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b03f6562-9895-4613-922f-ae7ddedede3d9c Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:11:34 -0500 Vision loss risks in patients using popular GLP-1 medications raise concerns
研究发现，“健康”食品标签可能会减少消费者的支出佛罗里达大学新大学研究表明，一些旨在推动美国人选择更健康食品的食品标签可能会产生相反的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/healthy-food-labels-may-reduce-consumer-gonsumer-gonsumer-gendender-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/healthy-food-food-labels-may-reduce-consumer-gonsumer-gensearch-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A2D0BC0E-8F9C-4D8C-4D8C-9CCB-B824B824B6F8A8A4 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:04:10 -0500 "Healthy" food labels may reduce consumer spending, research finds
研究表明，对不平等的意识如何推动对再分配政策的支持社会心理和人格科学的新研究表明，当人们了解收入不平等如何在医疗保健和教育方面造成差异时，他们更有可能支持解决经济不平等的政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-shows-how-aw-warenes-of-inequality-inequality-drives-drives-support-support-for-redistribneip-policies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-shows-how-aw-warenes-of-inequality-inequality-inequality-drives-support-support-for-redistrib-policies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=Ab79f3b-a763-44ab-8c3e-f77ddd506a275 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 20:59:57 -0500
低收入与糖尿病年轻人死亡率更高的风险有关Sin Gon Kim教授的研究团队和韩国大学Anam Hospital的内科（内分泌学和代谢）的Nam Hoon Kim教授以及三星医学中心的Ji Yoon Kim教授确认，具有低收入T2D的年轻人有3次比收入高的死亡风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/low-income-linked-to-mortality-mortality-mortality-risk-risk-in-young-risk-ing-adults-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/low-income-linked-to-mortality-mortality-mortality-risk-risk-in-young-risk-ing-adults-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29b4b3b5-0a11-448e-b943-b943-bb6e40928b01 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 20:51:50 -0500 Low income linked to higher mortality risk in young adults with diabetes
